column4: hp deskjet f4480 wont work.  running u-10.04.  gives incorrect error msg 'out of paper', but there is paper.  google searchd installed updated hplip, that din't solve the prob.  (scanner doesn't work either). anybody have any ideas? oh, also idid a power reset, no lu ck.
Does the printer itself show out of paper or just the UI interface?
the ui, i just lookd at the unit i don't know where it might indicate out of paper on the box itself
On my hp printer, it will show a blinking 'E' on the unit when there's a problem (such as out-of-paper)
In addition, my hp psc 1200 works beautifully with hplip
never had any problems with it
nope, nothing like that showing anywhere
yes, thats what surprises me, usually hp plays great with ubuntu
I guess it could be a driver issue but I'd suspect some configuration is confusing it
I wouldn't really know what though, as I've never had an issue
k, thx --- anybody else know anything about printer issues?
Check sys>admin>printers and make sure there's only a single device
yes, i removed previous printers from configure
Not really sure what else to tell you other than read the links ubottu offered
